channel.title: Posts on yk6`s Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on yk6`s Blog

item.title: WSL2 Ubuntu distro upgrade
item.description: Upgrade WSL2 Ubuntu OS Upgrade all packages to latest version sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade Install update manager sudo apt-get install update-manager-core Set Prompt value in /etc/update-manager/release-upgrades to select between lts or normal release Remove snapd by the follow cmd, (solution source) sudo apt remove snapd Perform the upgrade, add -d option for getting the latest experiment release sudo do-release-upgrade After completing, confirm the release version lsb_release -a

item.title: Youtube
item.description: Download to download video from youtube, the following packages can be used youtube-dl https://github.com/ytdl-org/youtube-dl package can be obtained by $ pip3 install youtube-dl streamlink https://streamlink.github.io/ package can be obtained by $ pip3 install streamlink Usually I use youtube-dl for downloading post-stream video, and streamlink to record livestream. Youtube-dl also supports passing in of user cookie to get access to member only content for channels.

item.title: Minecraft MOD
item.description: 用Forge幫MC裝mod 先從以下URL安裝對應版本的Forge https://files.minecraftforge.net/net/minecraftforge/forge/ 在安裝過程中，要安裝Client版本的forge 也就是用戶端版本 若是電腦沒

item.title: Website Design Resource
item.description: Useful weblink for website design https://nodesign.dev/ Contains many UI tool and design resources eg. Arts, Pictures, Fonts, CSS, Color, Generators, Icons, Inspiration, Video https://www.fontfabric.com/ Different style of font free for use https://www.flaticon.com/ Free icon database library in a range of formats(png,svg,eps,psd) https://www.favicon-generator.org/ Converter for Image(png,jpg,gif) to favicon format

item.title: transfer OS to new ssd/hdd
item.description: How to transfer OS from 1 computer to another Prepare empty HDD/SSD Download https://tw.easeus.com/backup-recovery/migrate-windows-10-to-ssd.html Follow instruction in step 2 HDD/SSD must be bigger than actual physical size of disk that is being replicated eg. ur physical disk is splited into C drive(512G) and D drive(512G) then a HDD/SSD of 1T is required even though C and D drive is virtually different or you can delete D drive (delete volumn/partition) via disk manager in Windows giving a 512G of C drive and unallocated 512G of nothing Perform actual copying action Boot with new disk and check window is working fine If you want to reset Windows, check that all user content you wish to preserve is copied out else, after resetting, new user may not access the folders as it have no permission granted as the the permission still belongs to the original user(the one before you reset) If step 7 is done but files are not accessible, read up on https://answers.

item.title: php page
item.description: How to run php script it may contain .php, .ini, .css to start with download xampp put folder with php under htdocs at path ../xampp/htdocs/ur_folder open control panel and start apache and mysql find the php at localhost/ur_folder_name

item.title: Setup SSR
item.description: Setup up gcp 沒特別標明的選項就是用default google gcp open gcp account 去主控台 主控台 在Computer Engine 裡 創一個 VM 執行個體 建立VM 執行個體 選個地方 (區域: 台灣

item.title: Hugo
item.description: Hugo My folder structure . ├── blog └── resources how to create new page $ ./blog hugo new [page_name].md start server $ ./blog hugo server push public files $ ./blog/public git... reference https://mogeko.me/2018/018/ draft 要改成false才會publish to public 每次回到根目錄./blog

item.title: markdown
item.description: markdown H2 H3 H6 My Great Heading this is a quote quote with formatting list unordered &nbps; bold italicized text blockquote title more details https://markdown.tw/ https://www.markdownguide.org/cheat-sheet/ https://github.com/adam-p/markdown-here/wiki/Markdown-Cheatsheet
